description:
**Fix Overview**:

The issue with users being unable to access shared calendars in the Outlook desktop client has been addressed and resolved after a series of service restorations.

1. Monitor the service status for updates on similar issues which may have affected shared calendar access.
2. Inform users to check their ability to update or cancel calendar items again post-restoration.

**Details**:
- This issue was logged as a known problem (ID: ex800425) impacting Exchange Online services, and it has now been classified as 'service restored' as of July 12, 2024.
- Continuous observation will be maintained to ensure ongoing service stability and to evaluate any underlying causes of the impact. (LLM Synthesized)
